#summary How to use Android ROME Feed Reader
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= JDOM = 

This project requires a forked version of JDOM that is available from [http://code.google.com/p/android-rome-feed-reader/downloads/detail?name=jdom-1.1.1-android-fork.jar&can=2&q= downloads].

= Maven =

Add the Maven repository hosted on Google Code to your project's pom.xml:

{{{
<repositories>
  <repository>
    <id>android-rome-feed-reader-repository</id>
    <name>Android ROME Feed Reader Repository</name>
    <url>https://android-rome-feed-reader.googlecode.com/svn/maven2/releases</url>
  </repository>
</repositories>
}}}

Then add this dependency to your project's pom.xml:

{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.google.code.android-rome-feed-reader</groupId>
  <artifactId>android-rome-feed-reader</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.0-r2</version>
</dependency>
}}}

= Ant =

Manually download the feed reader jar from the [http://code.google.com/p/android-rome-feed-reader/downloads/list download page]. You will also need to download JDOM 1.1.1-android-forked from the download page.
